name: "I'd Rather Lose Money Myself..."
description: Each time your opponent gains 2 Elemental Dice during this Round, you gain 1 Omni Element. (Elemental Die provided by this effect are excluded)
descriptionraw: Each time your opponent gains 2 Elemental Dice during this Round, you gain 1 $[K411]. (Elemental Die provided by this effect are excluded)
descriptionreplaced: Each time your opponent gains 2 Elemental Dice during this Round, you gain 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1111}Omni Element</color>. (Elemental Die provided by this effect are excluded)
